summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 HUMMER H3. WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED, IT SHUT OFF WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL RELAY AND THE FUEL PUMP NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE CONTACT CALLED EDWARDS CHEVROLET BUICK GMC CADILLAC AT 712-366-9400 (LOCATED AT 3400 SOUTH EXPY, COUNCIL BLUFFS, IA 51501) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WAS NO RECALL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND REFERRED THE CONTACT TO NHTSA. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 91,000.
